_meta.source: Researched from Hong Kong Tourism Board, TripAdvisor, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Kowloon, Hong Kong Island, and Lantau Island

transit_routes.name: MTR Metro
transit_routes.note: Excellent metro system. Octopus card recommended for all transport.

transit_routes.name: Star Ferry
transit_routes.note: Iconic harbor crossing since 1888. Best value sightseeing in Hong Kong.

featured_experiences.name: Victoria Peak
featured_experiences.note: Go for sunset. Peak Tram queues long - consider bus 15 from Central as alternative.

featured_experiences.name: Big Buddha & Ngong Ping
featured_experiences.note: 25-min cable car with stunning views. Crystal cabin upgrade available.

featured_experiences.name: Symphony of Lights
featured_experiences.note: Free nightly at 8pm. Best from Tsim Sha Tsui promenade or Aqua Luna junk boat.
